elements.title: Tubulophilinopsis gardineri (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the predatory sea slug Tubulophilinopsis gardineri (pictured) hunts other sea slugs by following the mucus trails they leave?

elements.title: Aisha de Sequeira (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Aisha de Sequeira led Morgan Stanley's mergers and acquisitions in India when it was the top bank by the value of its deals in 2012?

elements.title: BASIC-8 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that David Ahl purchased BASIC-8 to sell with the PDP-8 when DEC management proved more interested in their own FOCAL language?

elements.title: Pixie Davies (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that although Pixie Davies has been performing in films since 2012, her breakout role came in Disney's Mary Poppins Returns in 2018?

elements.title: semi-cursive script (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that during the Edo period, commoners used semi-cursive script while scholars used regular script?

elements.title: Knyaz Hasanov (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Kurdish-Armenian politician Knyaz Hasanov chaired the Armenian Parliament in 2017 and 2021?

elements.title: declining birthrate of the United States (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that President Theodore Roosevelt described the declining birthrate of the United States as a form of "race suicide", citing a term coined by eugenicist Edward Alsworth Ross?

elements.title: Piers Shonks (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that according to local legend Piers Shonks, whose tomb can be seen in the Brent Pelham church, killed a dragon ravaging the district?
